name: Submarine UFO
description:
Context: Your UFO fell into a sea full of sharks. Regain engine power by catching small fish and avoiding hitting fierce sharks on the way.

Your UFO 

How to play:

+ Use the Left Mouse Button to dive (go down),

+ Use the Right Mouse Button to catch all fishes around.

This was supposed to be a submission for a small jam that I ended up not finishing in time. So here is the result, I hope you'll have fun playing this small little endless runner.
